title: Intra MEC Programming Contest 2025
description: Annual programming competition open to all MEC students. Compete in algorithmic problem-solving and coding challenges.

title: Hands-on Robotics Workshop
description: Learn the fundamentals of robotics, build your first robot, and explore sensors, actuators, and programming.

title: LLM Study Circle Meetup
description: Deep dive into Large Language Models. Discussion on architecture, fine-tuning, and practical applications.

title: Programming Contest 2025
description: Intensive 3-day bootcamp covering React, Next.js, APIs, and modern web development practices.

title: AI & Machine Learning Seminar 2024
description: Industry experts share insights on AI trends, career opportunities, and hands-on ML projects.

title: MEC Hackathon 2024
description: 48-hour hackathon bringing together developers to build innovative solutions for real-world problems.

title: Git & GitHub Workshop
description: Master version control with Git and collaborate using GitHub. Essential skills for every developer.

title: Tech Career Fair 2024
description: Connect with top tech companies, explore internship opportunities, and network with industry professionals.

title: Advanced C++ Workshop
description: Deep dive into modern C++ features, STL, templates, and performance optimization techniques.

title: IoT & Embedded Systems Seminar
description: Introduction to Internet of Things, embedded programming, and building connected devices.
